dialogues.text: Great job! Your crops grew very well. I'm sensing you will be quite the skillful farmer one day!

options.text: Why do you live so far outside the town?

dialogues.text: I found that the ground here is very fertile, the ground absorbs fresh mountain water from the Farnor River, which makes it the perfect place for growing crops.
You may find other types of Farming Patches around Myrinnia where you can grow different kinds of fruits, vegetables or trees.
